headline: Comcast Corporation’s (CMCSA) Board of Directors Approves the Formation of Versant Media Group
summary: ​Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) is one of the Cheap NASDAQ Stocks to Buy Now. On December 3, Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA) announced that its Board of Directors had approved the separation of cable television networks and complementary digital platforms from its remaining businesses. This will result in the creation of a new independent publicly traded company called […]

headline: Comcast’s NBCU Spinoff Into Versant Media Could Be A Game Changer For Comcast (CMCSA)
summary: Comcast Corporation recently approved the separation of its legacy NBCUniversal cable television networks and related digital platforms into a new independent, publicly traded company, Versant Media Group, with shareholders set to receive one Versant share for every 25 Comcast shares in a pro rata distribution expected on January 2, 2026. This move highlights Comcast's effort to ring‑fence structurally challenged linear TV assets, potentially sharpening its focus on broadband, streaming, and...
